subdisciplines.name: Weaving
subdisciplines.description: The art of interlacing two sets of threads at right angles to create a fabric or textile.

subdisciplines.name: Knitting
subdisciplines.description: The art of creating a fabric or textile by interlocking loops of yarn with knitting needles.

subdisciplines.name: Embroidery
subdisciplines.description: The art of decorating fabric or other materials with needle and thread or yarn.

subdisciplines.name: Dyeing
subdisciplines.description: The art of applying color to fabric or other materials to alter their appearance.
